SELECT P_CODE, P_NAME,P_PRICE, P_GENDER, P_IMG, DATA FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM,N.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PINFO ORDER BY P_PRICE DESC) N) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
SELECT P_CODE, P_NAME,P_PRICE, P_GENDER, P_IMG, DATA FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM,N.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PINFO ORDER BY P_PRICE ASC) N) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
SELECT P_CODE, P_NAME,P_PRICE, P_GENDER, P_IMG, DATA FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM,N.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PINFO ORDER BY DATA DESC) N) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
SELECT BRAND_NAME FROM BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID=#{param1 }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PINFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PINFO(P_CODE, P_NAME, P_PRICE, P_CLASS, P_GENDER, P_IMG, DATA, P_IMG2, P_IMG3, P_IMG4, P_IMG5, BRAND, P_CATEGORY) VALUES(PINFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, SYSDATE, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8}, #{param9}, #{param10}, #{param11})
